1.content:
Benjamin Wolfe was a peculiar fellow with a sexual attraction to sneezing. He has had this attraction or fetish since he was a young lad, having a nanny that constantly sneezed while taking care of him being the event that created this mild fascination that slowly grew into a fetish. Once he was old enough to take care of himself she was let go, with her gone he know longer had anyone to satiate his fixation.

His mother and father were never around much because of work. They sent post cards and letters regularly and only came home on the big holidays like Christmas and Thanksgiving. He considered his friends to be his true family.

He never told any of his friends about his odd attraction to sneezing, instead he kept it to himself and enjoyed it when he could. In truth he had never heard any of his friends sneeze and he really wanted to know. So today he planned to make his friends sneeze as discreetly as possible. But who was he going to make sneeze first?
1.title: The Start

11.content:
He decided that shy Kabuki would be a good place to start. He pulled his phone out and called her. It was several rings before she picked it up.

"Hello? This is Kabuki..." Her voice was at a shy whisper.

"It's Ben."

"Oh! What is it?" She raised her voice to a normal level as soon as she knew it was a friend.

"Do you want to meet someplace?" He asked.

" Where will we be going?" Came the reply.
11.title: Kabuki

choices: Ben and Isis are supposed to go to the park.
Ben and Isis are supposed to go to the theater.
Ben and Isis are supposed to go to the store.
Ben decides he doesn't want to go anywhere, and invites Isis inside.
12.content:
Thankfully, the decision was quickly made for him as the doorbell rang and a sing-song voice called out to the wolf.

"Beee~n! Where Aaa~re you~?"

The sleek, green-furred feline standing at the door was grinning just enough to show a bit of fang. She tapped two claws idly on the thigh of her short cargo shorts (Very... very short.), fidgeting as she waited and called out. Slim and trim, Isis had a tall but shapely figure, alluring short-cut hair that gave her a mischievous look, and a long tail that swished with impatience. All of her fur was green, of varying darkness, with extra-dark green stripes on her face, ears, arms, legs, and around her sides; the stripes stopped at her light-green belly and around her breasts, but those areas were covered by a light purple halter top and black tube top. Dropping the saccharine sweetness from her voice, she called again.

"Ben! It's rude to keep a lady waiting. We're supposed to go to the-"
12.title: Isis

choices: Offer her face massage (You know she has a sensitive nose)
Chat (and hope the sneeze fairy will help you out)
124.content:
Before Isis can finish her sentence Ben opens the door.

"Hey Isis!" Ben said very cheerfully.

Isis was surprised that Ben had opened the door so suddenly but then smiled and replied "Took you long enough!" as she laughed and walked into the house.

"Wanna just hang out here?" Ben said hoping to execute his plan.

"Sure Ben" Isis said with a smile.

Ben then invited Isis to go sit with him on the couch.

Isis then asked "What do you wanna do Ben?"
124.title: Ben decides he doesn't want to go anywhere,...

1241.content:
"Why don't we play truth or dare?" Ben said feeling a bit nervous as it's a bit strange but this plan might just get him that sneeze he's been dying to see.

"Hmm, truth or dare haven't played that game in a long time" Isis replied debating whether or not she wanted to play.

"Come on, it'll be fun!" Ben said desperately trying to convince her to play.

"Oh alright, why not?" Isis said smiling. She has no clue what she's in for Ben thought to himself.

"You go first" Isis said.

Ben very happily said "truth or dare?" hoping she would pick dare.

Isis hesitated for a minute then said "Dare!" Ben was so happy and nervous at the same time, but did he have the guts to do it?

What does Ben dare Isis to do?
1241.title: Truth or Dare

12411.content:
"Alright Isis I dare you to sneeze" Ben said trying to sound as normal as possible.

"W-What? You dare me to sneeze? But I don't have to sneeze?" Isis said very confused.

Ben started getting very nervous but then Isis said "Oh well a dares a dares" Ben felt very relieved and very excited he was finally gonna see Isis sneeze.

Isis felt very hesitant as she hated her sneeze but asked Ben "You got a feather laying around here?"

"I'll look around for one, give me a minute" Ben said as he went to look for one and shortly after he found one.

"Found one!" Ben shouted to Isis. Ben returns to Isis with the feather and hands it to her.

"Alright here we go" Isis said then she raised the feather to her nose and started tickling it back and fourth. Ben is going wild at this point, he struggles to hide his excitement.

Within seconds Isis starts hitching and the sneeze begins

"hah,,,...hah.....hah........HAAA-CHOOOO!" Isis lets out an enormous sneeze completely uncovered that was so loud the neighbors definitely heard, not only that he sneeze was so powerful it shook the couch.

"Wow Bless you Isis that was quite a sneeze" Ben said again hiding his extreme excitement.

"Haha thanks Ben" Isis replied a little embaressed

"You need a tissue?" Ben said happily

"Yes please" replied Isis with a smile
12411.title: Dare Isis to sneeze

choices: Just stay away from the nose
1242.content:
"Can I offer you a face massage, my lady?"

Isis stares blankly at Ben for a moment, then shakes her head a bit.

"Sorry," she starts, with a look of seemingly-earnest confusion. "What did you just ask me?"

Ben grins, deciding to press his luck.

"Come on, you came all the way down here! The least I can do is treat you to one of my world-famous face massages." He knew he was laying it on pretty thick, but with Isis, the worst that could happen is that she'd take it as a joke. And, as luck would have it, she laughed a little in response.

"You're a pretty weird dude, Ben. Where did you learn how to massage?"

"Internet?" Ben replied hopefully. This elicited a nose-scrunching from Isis.

"Hmm... well, alright, go ahead. Oh, but stay away from... uh, my nose," she continued, looking a little embarrassed and going quiet as she reached the end of her sentence. "You know."

The male wolf nodded, but grimaced mentally. That was the whole point of this! What does he do now?
1242.title: Offer her face massage (You know she has a sens...

13.content:
Mia, a vixen one year younger then himself and quite the looker, that is who his first victim will be.

Benjamin had known her since he was a young cub, he was five and she was four when they had met at a playground his nanny used to take him to. If he recalled correctly they met at the swing set. That was eighteen years ago. They were still the best of friends and promised that no matter what, they would always be friends.

The twenty-two year old vixen had a perfect hourglass figure, a figure most women would die for and most men would sell their souls to spend a single night with. She was oblivious and gullible to an extent and she was always happy and bubbly. Amazingly she could always figure out when someone was lying or trying to deceive her. The only thing no one has been able to do yet is convince her to come home with them and continue their good time. Many men and a handful of women have tried and none have succeeded.

Benjamin picked up his phone and called her.

It seemed to Benjamin that an eternity would pass by before she would answer her phone, when in reality it was only on the third ring. "Hello, Ben."

"Hey, Mia, do you want to...
13.title: Mia

choices: Pepper- red or black? He can't remember.
Feathers- did he still have some...?
134.content:
...come over to my house? I'd love to see you." Ben finished. This was true; he did want to see Mia, so she shouldn't be able to tell something was up.

There was a silence that made the wolf a bit nervous, but then the soft, throaty voice replied. "Sure, Ben! That would be wonderful. Do you want me to bring anything? Maybe some lunch for later?"
Grinning, Ben declined, saying that she only had to bring herself. After hanging up, he took stock of his affairs. The beautiful fox would soon be here, and he needed to make sure he had everything he needed for his plans... did he have pepper? What about feathers? And maybe tissues... although Mia didn't tend to cover.
The first thing that he checked on was his-
134.title: come over to my house?"

choices: Surprise, someone else is at the door
1342.content:
Feathers, a tool he always imagined using, his fantasy tool. Underneath his bed was a wooden box the size of a shoe box and inside this box was feathers of all kinds, big and small, fluffy and stiff. Some came from feather dusters, others came from pillows, and a handful were ordered off of those adult websites that sells kinky toys and tools for sexual tickling and teasing. No doubt no one ever thought of using them on a nose, but that was Benjamin's desired target. A nice sensitive nose that would surely succumb to the power of a feather.

"I've got the feathers, now all I need is Mia."

Speak of the devil, someone was knocking on his door. A long white feather was selected from his collection and placed into his breast pocket before he rushed to answer his door.
1342.title: Feathers- did he still have some...?

choices: -If you wanted something to eat! (Pepper the food)
-If you wanted to play a little game? (Take the direct approach)
13421.content:
...standing there in all of her well-proportioned beauty with a big smile on her face was the fox herself.

"Hi, Ben!" She said, as our hero welcomed her in. Ben let his eyes roam over her body for only a second, remembering it was considered impolite in most places to ogle your friends... even if they were as attractive as Mia. He blinked hard and tried to get his thoughts back on track. He had his feathers, but what now?

"Mia, thanks for coming. You want to have a seat...? I can get food, drink, anything you want." He came up with a few ideas of how to get the feather into play. Maybe if he got her nose itchy or runny, he could create an excuse? No, that's silly... should he just ask her if she wants to play a little game...? She might see through it, but those were the only two options he could think of.

They sat down and Mia asked what he was so busy thinking about, to which Ben had no ready answer.

"Oh, er... I... just wanted to ask-"
13421.title: Mia is at the door

134211.content: "-if you wanted something to eat. I've been hungry all day!" Ben's stomach was doing flips, he was trying not to look excited. He wondered if this would work, even though he knew the question wasn't suspicious at all. At last, Mia answered. "Sure, I've been hungry, too. I would like some pasta, please." That made Ben's mission a whole lot easier. He could put pepper on the pasta! He ran to the kitchen, got the pepper out and the pasta. He warmed it up, and dumped the pepper on it. A little too much, but it would do. He ran so fast to get the pasta to Mia that he tripped and dropped the pasta. "Are you okay?" He heard Mia asked from the other room. Ben thought about what his options were. He could have Mia come here, or he could keep her away. If Mia came, she might sneeze, put then again, she would see all the pepper. But if he kept her away, he may never see her sneeze, to his would be disappointment. "Are you okay?" He heard Mia call louder. "I-
134211.title: -If you wanted something to eat! (Pepper the food)

choices: Mia thinks they should try it with alcohol
134212.content:
"If you wanted to try out this game with me."
"A game?" Mia leaned forwards, eyes bright and interested. If this went well, they could soon be bright for a very different reason- but he mustn't get ahead of himself.
"Um, yes. It's- well, it may seem a little weird, but-" inspiration struck. "But a few of the guys were playing it as a drinking game- not that you need to drink! I just- I couldn't believe it was as difficult as they made it look, and I hoped that you might be willing to help me find out. I thought that, of my friends, you might be the least likely to find it too weird. And, well- I thought I could trust you, if it was weird, not to spread it around and make me look like a fool."
To his slight relief, Mia laughed. "You're making it into quite the mystery, Ben! But of course you can trust me- I know I'd trust you with most things too. But come on- what did this drinking game involve?"
"Well" Ben went on, glad of the thinking time her interruption provided, "It was pretty simple. They would sit in pairs or threes and tickle one another's noses with feathers and stuff. If you sneezed, you took a shot. They were all pretty drunk by the end, and I thought- well, surely it can't be that hard."
The suggestion made, he waited anxiously for her response.
134212.title: -If you wanted to play a little game? (Take the...

14.content:
Brimstone would be his first target since he had to pick him up from work soon anyway.

Brimstone was a broad shouldered reptile with crimson scales and black stripes going down his back and tail and three stripes on both his arms and legs. Tufts of gold fur sprouts out from his head, ears, shoulders, elbows, ankles, and at the tip of his tail. Two large horns stick out the top of his head and curve back behind his ears and end in a sharp point and two small spikes stick out above his nostrils. He is short in stature with broad shoulders and a muscular body build.

Brimstone is half dragon and half velociraptor hybrid. With his dragon blood he is able to breath fire at will.

Benjamin gathered up his things and prepared to pick his friend up. Thoughts of how he could make Stone (Brimstone's nickname.) sneeze without getting caught flowed through his head as he left his home and climbed into his truck.

The drive wasn't long and the traffic was pretty clear, cleared then usual at this time of day.

Where did Benjamin have to go to pick up Stone?
14.title: Brimstone

info.brief_description: An interactive story that will put my many furry/anthro characters into sneezy situations.
info.description:
Here are a list of characters that will be used in this story with a short description and picture references to.

Kabuki: A petite red panda girl with bright pink fur and white fur and light sky blue hair that turns white at the tips. She is shy and quiet, not outspoken. She hates to be the center of attention. She tends to stifle her sneezes and hopes no one will notice.
http://www.furaffinity.net/view/7836016/
Isis: A sexy seductive feline with light green fur with slightly darker green stripes and a yellow/green underbelly. She has short pixie hair that is the same color as her furry underbelly with one green streak. She hates her sneeze because it is loud and powerful, not cute or feminine at all.
http://www.furaffinity.net/view/7846477/
Mia: A fun loving vixen that has that perfect hourglass figure, big butt and large bust that all desire. She has the normal fur coloration of a standard fox. She does not fight her need to sneeze and instead embraces it, in a way she kind of likes the way it feels and will occasionally make herself sneeze if one gets stuck.
http://www.furaffinity.net/view/8405374/
Brimstone: A muscular, prehistoric male with broad shoulders and sharp claws. He is covered in red scales with black strips and a few patches of golden fur on his head, shoulders, and ankles. He has to be careful with his sneeze since he tends to breath fire. He is part dragon and part Dinosuar.
http://www.furaffinity.net/view/8739647/

You will be playing the part of Benjamin Wolfe, a tall and toned red wolf with a thing for sneezing. The story will follow him and his exploits as he tries to make his friends sneeze without getting caught of course. Arming himself with feathers, pepper, and sneeze powder. What kind of situations will he be putting his friends into?
